title: Ghost of the Black
description: Ghost is possibly the best bounty hunter in the universe and he always gets the job done. At least, that's the reputation that he rides on. When the DAP employ him to track down and capture a rogue Magicker that's running across the galaxy killing anyone that gets in his way, Ghost realises that this is a job that could cost him his reputation. It's also a job that could cost him his sanity.An action packed, noir sci-fi novella from Alan Baxter, author of dark fantasty novels RealmShift and MageSign.
author: Alan Baxter
